page.title: 05Suspected arson in Wantage.
page.content: Early ,on June 23rd,1985 some people broke a window at the back of the hall at Icknield Hall of Wantage School. They entered the staffroom,put paper on the chairs and set fire to it.The seats are made of foam so they gave off fumes. Some people living nearby saw the flames and smoke and gave the alarm. There was a footprint outside.The staffroom could not be used.Music Workshop was cancelled that day. My dad, who teaches there,had his photograph in the Wantage Herald with a group of people who helped to clear up after the fire.
